caption: The photograph captures a close-up view of water, potentially a sea or ocean, under strong sunlight. The predominant feature of the image is the dazzling reflection of sunlight on the water's surface, creating a pattern of glittering, undulating ridges and patches. These illuminated areas contrast sharply with the darker sections of water, which absorb rather than reflect the light. The image conveys a sense of fluid motion and natural texture, emphasizing the play of light and shadow. There are no visible landmarks, people, or objects in the scene; the focus is entirely on the interaction between light and water. The overall effect is both dynamic and serene, hinting at the vastness and untouched beauty of the natural world.
title: Late afternoon surf at maliko bay
